SEARCH

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
The Main class handles the setup and execution of an election system. It supports multiple types of elections: Plurality, Single Transferable Vote (STV), and Multi-Vote (MV). The program prompts the user for necessary election parameters, processes input files, and initializes the election based on the selected type. The election system processes votes, handles various election types, and records results for audits.

    • Main

      public Main()

  • Method Details

    • parseElectionType

      public static int parseElectionType(Scanner fileReader)
      Parses the user's input to determine the election type. Valid election types: - "PV" for Plurality - "STV" for Single Transferable Vote - "MV" for Municipal-Vote
      Parameters:
      fileReader - A Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      0 for Plurality, 1 for STV, 2 for MV, or -1 for invalid input.

    • parseShuffleOption

      public static boolean parseShuffleOption(String[] args, int electionType)
      Parses command-line arguments to determine if ballot shuffling is enabled for STV elections.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.
      electionType - The type of election selected (0 for Plurality, 1 for STV, 2 for MV).
      Returns:
      true if shuffling is enabled, false otherwise.

    • parseFilenames

      public static ArrayList<String> parseFilenames(Scanner userInput)
      Prompts the user for the election data filename(s). Multiple file paths can be entered, and the user ends the input with 'q'.
      Parameters:
      userInput - A Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the filenames of the files to be used for election tabulation

    • parseAuditFilename

      public static String parseAuditFilename(Scanner userInput)
      Prompts the user for an audit filename to store election logs.
      Parameters:
      userInput - A Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      A valid filename with a ".txt" extension or "Invalid" for invalid input.

    • parseNumSeats

      public static int parseNumSeats(Scanner fileReader)
      Prompts the user to enter the number of seats available in the election.
      Parameters:
      fileReader - A Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      The number of seats if valid, or -1 for invalid input.

    • parseNumCandidates

      public static int parseNumCandidates(Scanner fileReader)
      Prompts the user to enter the number of candidates in the election. The number of candidates must be a positive integer.
      Parameters:
      fileReader - A Scanner object to read user input.
      Returns:
      The number of candidates if valid, or -1 for invalid input.

    • createFileScanners

      public static ArrayList<Scanner> createFileScanners(ArrayList<String> filenames)
      Creates a Scanner object to read the election file.
      Parameters:
      filenames - A list of election filesname strings
      Returns:
      A Scanner object if the file is found, otherwise null.

    • readCandidates

      public static ArrayList<Candidate> readCandidates(Scanner fileReader)
      Reads and parses candidate names from the election file.
      Parameters:
      fileReader - A Scanner object to read from the file.
      Returns:
      A list of Candidate objects.

    • readBallots

      public static ArrayList<Ballot> readBallots(ArrayList<Scanner> fileReaders, ArrayList<Candidate> candidates)
      Reads ballots from the election file and associates rankings with candidates.
      Parameters:
      fileReaders - A list of Scanner objects to read from the files
      candidates - The list of candidates.
      Returns:
      A list of Ballot objects.

    • parseNumBallots

      public static int parseNumBallots(ArrayList<Scanner> fileReaders)
      Parses the number of ballots from the election files.
      Parameters:
      fileReaders - A list of Scanner objects to read from the files.
      Returns:
      The total number of ballots if valid, or -1 for invalid input.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method that does the setup, parsing, and execution of the election. Depending on the election type, the appropriate election process is started.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments for ballot shuffling.
